description: Haupt-exponents of 5 modulo integers relatively prime to 5.
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..7999
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Multiplicative Order
maple: n := 1 :for i from 2 to 10000 do    if igcd(i,5) = 1 then        printf("%d %d\n",n,numtheory[order](5,i)) ;        n := n+1 ;    end if;end do: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 14 2014
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
